cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG AMF IP address to an invalid format '999.999.999.999' will cause network binding failures and prevent AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the uplink carrier bandwidth to an excessively high value of 500 will exceed the maximum allowed bandwidth and cause configuration validation errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行載波頻寬設定為過高的值 500，將超過允許的最大頻寬，並導致配置驗證錯誤。
